abstract: Museum of Ice Cream, which will be open in Manhattan's meatpacking district until Aug 31, targets millennials with calculated experience that taps into nostalgia for summer days; project was undertaken by coalition of 30 sponsors, including Dove Chocolate, who have all contributed elements of corporate marketing along with cost-free fun.

headline.print_headline: Swimming in a Sea of Sprinkles: Museum of Ice Cream’s Quirky Allure
headline.main: The Museum of Ice Cream Is Sold Out. Here’s What You’re Missing.

snippet: The sold-out spectacle is the brainchild of a digital strategist whose longtime dream was to jump into a pool full of sprinkles....
lead_paragraph: The sold-out spectacle is the brainchild of a digital strategist whose longtime dream was to jump into a pool full of sprinkles.
